an7.47:13.4: See BB’s note for ahuta. The pun here is a direct reference to the sex magic of the Brihadarannyaka, where the “sacrificial offering” of the father is the semen, which is offered in the “sacrificial fire” of the mother’s yoni. Incubated does not really capture this!
an7.47:15.2: Here I follow BB in accepting the PTS reading madappamādā.
an7.47:16.1: This last is a curious piece of advice. perhaps the Buddha is hinting that the whole fire thing is best “put aside”.
